name: MPSMatrixSolveCholesky
desc: A kernel for computing the solution of a linear system of equations using a Cholesky factorization.

func encode(commandBuffer: MTLCommandBuffer, sourceMatrix: MPSMatrix, rightHandSideMatrix: MPSMatrix, solutionMatrix: MPSMatrix)
